Description: Fragment of a wooden coffin; paint on plaster; two columns of blue Hieroglyphic text flanked by two squatting figures.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Dr David George Hogarth
Curator's comments: Zitman (2010, 129, 226 (II)) notes that this is marked '40'
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 226)
